traits.label: size
traits.name: :size
traits.desc: QChip size name or a CSS unit including unit name

traits.label: dark
traits.name: :dark
traits.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

traits.label: icon
traits.name: :icon
traits.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

traits.label: icon-right
traits.name: :icon-right
traits.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

traits.label: icon-remove
traits.name: :icon-remove
traits.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

traits.label: icon-selected
traits.name: :icon-selected
traits.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

traits.label: label
traits.name: :label
traits.desc: Chip's content as string; overrides default slot if specified

traits.label: color
traits.name: :color
traits.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: text-color
traits.name: :text-color
traits.desc: Overrides text color (if needed); Color name from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: model-value
traits.name: :model-value
traits.desc: Model of the component determining if QChip should be rendered or not

traits.label: selected
traits.name: :selected
traits.desc: Model for QChip if it's selected or not

traits.label: square
traits.name: :square
traits.desc: Sets a low value for border-radius instead of the default one, making it close to a square

traits.label: clickable
traits.name: :clickable
traits.desc: Is QChip clickable? If it's the case, then it will add hover effects and emit 'click' events

traits.label: removable
traits.name: :removable
traits.desc: If set, then it displays a 'remove' icon that when clicked the QChip emits 'remove' event

traits.label: ripple
traits.name: :ripple
traits.desc: Configure material ripple (disable it by setting it to 'false' or supply a config object)
examples: { early: true, center: true, color: 'teal', keyCodes: [] }
